basics.label: Business Development Executive
basics.summary: Top performing sales, marketing, and business development professional with proven ability to drive business expansion and development by planning and executing business strategies.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Developed new marketing strategies to capture market channels with new clients. Utilized sales and marketing tools to create brand awareness in the market.
highlights: Designed, underwrote and administered new and existing insurance programs
Expanded on existing business as well as identified potential revenue opportunities
Acted as a direct intermediary between customers and product development within IRIS on a variety of different insurance products.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Directed daily operations and provided administrative support to the staff.
highlights: Answered incoming calls and arranged appointments for guests to meet with company staff
Entered data into consumer relations database

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Generating and executing sales leads for three popular radio stations in the Bay Area; KNBR, 101.7 The Bone and K-Fog.
highlights: Writing and recording commercials for advertisers
Managing and updating the KNBR website

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Banquet Server, Food Server and Bartender
work.summary: Over five years' hands-on experience in food serving and bartending.
highlights: Highly skilled in greeting and guiding guests
Taking orders and communicating accurately to the kitchen and delivering correct orders to customers with a friendly and upbeat attitude

awards.title: Achievement for Excellent Student of the Year

skills.name: Marketing Skills
keywords: Designed, developed and implemented marketing and sales campaigns
Evaluated target markets and proposed marketing strategies
Managed all phases of direct mail projects; monitored production teams; recruited and guided vendors

skills.name: Writing Skills
keywords: Wrote creative copy for catalogs, brochures and social media
Produced variety of business materials, including: letters, reports, proposals and forms
Proof read and edited all referenced written materials

skills.name: Communication Skills
keywords: Promoted products and services; generated leads and initiated sales
